FOSSCELL MEC

FOSSCELL of MEC was made to inherit the technical workings of the College into a more ordered working conditions under the club, and also to bring forth Open Source culture by having enthusiasts working with the club on different interesting softwares and projects, with people around the world.

Join our mailing list for updates.
